## Generated Files

### Video (MP4)
```bash
../../pic2vid.sh -s ctime -d 1 1 1 1 3 \
  -m title="I brought you a flower" \
  -m artist="Loof & Timmy" \
  -m date="2025-12-21" \
  -m comment="ðŸ¦–ðŸ’¨ Follow @loofandtimmy so you don't miss the next comic!" \

```

**Output:** [flower.mp4](flower.mp4) - 63KB, 7 seconds

### Animated GIF
```bash
../../pic2vid.sh -f gif -s ctime -d 1 1 1 1 3 \
  -o flower.gif \
  *.jpg
```

**Output:** [flower.gif](flower.gif) - 248KB, 7 seconds

*Note: GIF format does not support embedded metadata.*

## Configuration

- **Sorting:** By creation time (oldest first)
- **Duration:** 1s, 1s, 1s, 1s, 3s per frame
- **Total Duration:** 7 seconds
- **Format:** 576x720 (adaptive to largest image)
